articles.title: iOS 26, iPadOS 26, macOS 26 Tahoe, and Apple’s other OS updates launch September 15 - Ars Technica

articles.title: Apple unveils Apple Watch Series 11, Watch Ultra 3, and Watch SE 3 - TechCrunch

Apple on Tuesday unveiled three new Apple Watch configurations and its annual hardware event: the Apple Watch Series 11, Apple Watch Ultra 3, and Apple Watch SE 3.
